Caesar - Class in Unnamed Package
The Caesar class provides methods for encrypting/decrypting messages using the Caesar cipher..

MonoAlphaSubstitution - Class in Unnamed Package
This class represents a monoalphabetic substitution cipher, Each character in the plaintext is replaced by a corresponding character in the substitution table.
MonoAlphaSubstitution() - Constructor for class MonoAlphaSubstitution
Default constructor Constructs an identity substitution table.

Constructor with String argument.
